author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Galliford Says FY 2018/19 Revenue Guidance Remains Unchanged​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Galliford Try Plc:
* INTERIM DIVIDEND 28 PENCEPER SHARE * HY GROUP REVENUE ‍1,403​ MILLION EUROS VERSUS 1,235 MILLION EUROS A YEAR AGO
* HY ‍PRE-EXCEPTIONAL PROFIT BEFORE TAX WAS £81.3M, UP 29%​
* ‍FOR FY2018/19 OUR REVENUE GUIDANCE REMAINS UNCHANGED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
